short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize on-screen what keys are pressed in real time to enhance your presentations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the currently pressed keyboard keys on the screen.

Very useful when doing trainings and presentations to display the keyboard shortcuts used on the screen.

Can be disabled/enabled with a single click.
